game.name: Battle Blocks
game.categories: 멀티플레이어, PvP, 온라인 PvP, 스크린 공유 및 분할 PvP, 공유 및 분할 화면, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Remote Play Together, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Battle Blocks is a physics-based Online/Couch fighter! Grab 2-8 of your friends. And blast them with grenades, guns, and whatever you can get your hands on! - "Rumper is not responsible for any loss of friends..."
game.shortDescriptionEn: Battle Blocks is a physics-based Online/Couch fighter! Grab 2-8 of your friends. And blast them with grenades, guns, and whatever you can get your hands on! - "Rumper is not responsible for any loss of friends..."
